column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday September 9 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: Serious injury collision at Kearney Ridge Blvd reportedly involving a motorcycle.
Outbound Georgetown Rd is shutdown at Spurr Rd.  Inbound Georgetown Rd is shutdown at Iron Works Pike and at Berea Rd.
Motorists should use I-75 to commute between Lexington and Georgetown until further notice.
